alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:51PM EDT until August 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Madison County in central New York... Northeastern Onondaga County in central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galeville, or near Syracuse, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Syracuse, Clay, Cicero, North Syracuse, Fayetteville, Minoa, East Syracuse, Liverpool, Bridgeport and Brewerton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
